The correct chronological order of the moments is option D: 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 5 -> 6.
First, in a dimly lit interview, the man asks "Are you broke?" and she replies she has "no money problems whatsoever." (1)
Next, loud trap-style music suddenly hits as a title card "The Queen of Shade and Laughter" appears. (2)
In front of a vibrant floral backdrop, wearing a yellow jacket, she clarifies "Take care of T-C-B â€” take care of business." (3)
A man standing among an audience asks, "Among the singers today, who is the next queen of soul?" (4)
On a talk-show panel with several women, she says she loves to eat. (5)
Finally, in a formal room with striped chairs and a chandelier, when asked "How do you want to be remembered?" she answers, "The lady takes care of business," and the scene shifts to loud hip-hop music. (6)

The correct order is C: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 5 -> 4 -> 6.
We first hear about the conversation at the piano (option 1), which leads us to her response (option 3). Then we learn about her outfit (option 2) during the interview. Afterward, she declines to comment on Nicki Minaj (option 3). Next, she talks about her father's sermons (option 4) in another interview. Finally, she mentions winning a trophy (option 5) and a funny story involving Lauryn Hill and a church (option 6) in a talk show-style interview.
